title: Remove Admin Setup link from navbar at specified XPath location

requirements.text: Remove the 'Admin Setup' navigation link from the Navbar.tsx component at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/nav[1]/div[1]/div[2], ensuring no 'Admin Setup' or 'Register Admin' link appears in the navigation menu for any user (authenticated or unauthenticated, admin or non-admin), completely eliminating this navigation option from the menu bar

quotes: not show admin setup in manu bar

acceptanceCriteria: The 'Admin Setup' link is completely removed from the navigation section at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/nav[1]/div[1]/div[2]
No 'Admin Setup' or 'Register Admin' link appears in the Navbar for any user role
The navigation menu displays only Home, Dashboard, and Admin (for admin users) links
The removal is permanent and does not conditionally re-appear based on authentication or role state

requirements.text: Verify that the admin registration functionality at route '/admin/register' remains accessible through direct URL navigation even though the navigation link is removed from the menu bar, ensuring admins can still register new admins by navigating directly to the URL when needed
acceptanceCriteria: The AdminRegistration page component remains functional at '/admin/register' route
Users can access the admin registration page by typing the URL directly
The admin registration form and functionality work correctly when accessed via direct URL
Only the navigation link is removed, not the underlying functionality

constraints: Do not modify the AdminRegistration.tsx page component or the '/admin/register' route definition
Do not change any other navigation links (Home, Dashboard, Admin)
Do not modify the authentication or role verification logic
Only remove the visual navigation link from the Navbar component
nonGoals: Fixing the underlying 'actor not available' error (separate issue)
Changing the admin registration backend logic
Adding alternative admin setup access methods
